contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 9th day of January, 2007, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The Order of the Superi- or Court is VACATED and the matter is REMANDED to the PCRA court for reinstatement of Petitioner’s direct appeal rights nunc pro tunc. See Commonwealth v. Lantzy, 558 Pa. 214, 736 A.2d 564 (1999).
